sentences.sContent: Many of them are coming to Moscow from quite far away for an opportunity to have this kind of educational experience.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many of them are coming to Moscow from quite far away for an opportunity to have this kind of educational experience.
sentences.sCn: 为了这样一个有教育意义的体验，他们中的很多人都是从很远的地方赶到莫斯科来的。
